summary:
This mod will allow you to either replace the asymmetrical Nord hero sword with a more symmetrical model. Or you can choose to add it to the forge instead of replacing the old model.
Requested by pmavatar.
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9WWz8.png[/IMG][/center]

Description
===========
This mod will allow you to either replace the asymmetrical Nord hero sword with a more symmetrical model. Or you can choose to add it to the forge instead of replacing the old model.

Expect a version of this mod that will make Red Eagle\'s Bane a more unique weapon.
Get it here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20939

Feature!
====================
[youtube]Ks7aqkWatxs[/youtube]

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
[s]High res pack has wrong structure[/s] - Solved

History
=======
v1 - initial release

Contact
=======
Right here on the Nexus.

Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim and the CK.
Thanks to The Nexus.com for the great service they provide.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.
Thanks to pmavatar for requesting this mod.

Tools Used
==========
7-Zip - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=15579
Blender - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=12248
GIMP - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=14920
NIFSkope - http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/NifSkope
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

Licensing/Legal
===============
The contents of this mod can be used on the sole condition that the authors permission to use the assets of this mod has been obtained and the author is duely credited for his work.
A link to the mod using these assets would be welcome as well =)

Related
===============
Looking for a fancy weapon to include in your new mod?
Look no further! Check out my
[size=\"3\"][color=\"#8B0000\"][url=\"http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12087\"][img]http://i.imgur.com/w43aI.png[/img][/url][/color][/size]
No permission needed, models and textures included in every download!
author: Urwy
